trans-unit.source: Each property of the <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> class is a <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> object that uses an image to fill the interior of a shape.
This class cannot be inherited.
Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object that uses the specified image.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> object with which this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object fills interiors.
Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object that uses the specified image and wrap mode.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> object with which this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object fills interiors.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"></xref> enumeration that specifies how this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object is tiled.
Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object that uses the specified image and bounding rectangle.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> object with which this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object fills interiors.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure that represents the bounding rectangle for this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object.
Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object that uses the specified image and bounding rectangle.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> object with which this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object fills interiors.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that represents the bounding rectangle for this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object.
Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object that uses the specified image, wrap mode, and bounding rectangle.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> object with which this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object fills interiors.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"></xref> enumeration that specifies how this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object is tiled.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure that represents the bounding rectangle for this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object.
Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object that uses the specified image, wrap mode, and bounding rectangle.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> object with which this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object fills interiors.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"></xref> enumeration that specifies how this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object is tiled.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that represents the bounding rectangle for this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object.
Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object that uses the specified image, bounding rectangle, and image attributes.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> object with which this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object fills interiors.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure that represents the bounding rectangle for this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object.
An <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes"></xref> object that contains additional information about the image used by this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object.
Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object that uses the specified image, bounding rectangle, and image attributes.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> object with which this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object fills interiors.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that represents the bounding rectangle for this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object.
An <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes"></xref> object that contains additional information about the image used by this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object.
Creates an exact copy of this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object this method creates, cast as an <xref href="System.Object"></xref> object.
Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> object associated with this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object.
An <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> object that represents the image with which this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object fills shapes.

Multiplies the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> object that represents the local geometric transformation of this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object by the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> object in the specified order.
The transformation matrix of a <xref:System.Drawing.TextureBrush> object specifies how the image that defines the texture is transformed.
For example, if the transformation matrix specifies a rotation of 90 degrees clockwise, the texture image is rotated by 90 degrees clockwise.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> object by which to multiply the geometric transformation.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"></xref> enumeration that specifies the order in which to multiply the two matrices.

Multiplies the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> object that represents the local geometric transformation of this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object by the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> object by prepending the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> object.
The transformation matrix of a <xref:System.Drawing.TextureBrush> object specifies how the image that defines the texture is transformed.
For example, if the transformation matrix specifies a rotation of 90 degrees clockwise, the texture image is rotated by 90 degrees clockwise.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> object by which to multiply the geometric transformation.
Resets the `Transform` property of this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object to identity.
Rotates the local geometric transformation of this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object by the specified amount.
This method prepends the rotation to the transformation.
The angle of rotation.
Rotates the local geometric transformation of this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object by the specified amount in the specified order.
The angle of rotation.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"></xref> enumeration that specifies whether to append or prepend the rotation matrix.
Scales the local geometric transformation of this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object by the specified amounts.
This method prepends the scaling matrix to the transformation.
The amount by which to scale the transformation in the x direction.
The amount by which to scale the transformation in the y direction.
Scales the local geometric transformation of this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object by the specified amounts in the specified order.
The amount by which to scale the transformation in the x direction.
The amount by which to scale the transformation in the y direction.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"></xref> enumeration that specifies whether to append or prepend the scaling matrix.

Gets or sets a copy of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> object that defines a local geometric transformation for the image associated with this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object.
A geometric transformation can be used to translate, scale, rotate, or skew the image that defines the texture of this brush.

Because the matrix returned and by the <xref:System.Drawing.TextureBrush.Transform%2A> property is a copy of the brush's geometric transform, you should dispose of the matrix when you no longer need it.

A copy of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> object that defines a geometric transformation that applies only to fills drawn by using this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object.
Translates the local geometric transformation of this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object by the specified dimensions.
This method prepends the translation to the transformation.
The dimension by which to translate the transformation in the x direction.
The dimension by which to translate the transformation in the y direction.
Translates the local geometric transformation of this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object by the specified dimensions in the specified order.
The dimension by which to translate the transformation in the x direction.
The dimension by which to translate the transformation in the y direction.
The order (prepend or append) in which to apply the translation.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"></xref> enumeration that indicates the wrap mode for this <xref href="System.Drawing.TextureBrush"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"></xref> enumeration that specifies how fills drawn by using this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush"></xref> object are tiled.
